mapper.select: SELECT dav.id, dav.version FROM devops_application da, devops_app_instance dai, devops_env de, devops_app_version dav WHERE da.id = dai.app_id AND de.id = dai.env_id AND dai.`status` = 'running' AND dai.app_version_id = dav.id AND de.project_id = #{projectId} AND de.id = #{envId} AND da.id = #{appId} GROUP BY dav.id,dav.version
SELECT davv.value FROM devops_app_version dav, devops_app_version_value davv WHERE dav.value_id = davv.id AND dav.id = #{versionId}

SELECT dav.id, dav.version FROM devops_app_version dav WHERE dav.app_id = #{appId}
AND dav.is_publish = TRUE
AND ( is_publish != TRUE OR is_publish IS NULL )
ORDER BY dav.id DESC

SELECT DISTINCT dav.id, dav.version FROM devops_app_version dav JOIN devops_app_instance dai ON dai.app_version_id = dav.id AND dai.`status` != 'deleted' JOIN devops_env de ON de.id = dai.env_id WHERE de.project_id = #{projectId} AND dav.app_id = #{appId} ORDER BY dav.id DESC
select dav.id, dav.version, dav.creation_date from devops_app_version dav where dav.app_id=#{applicationId} and dav.is_publish=1
SELECT dav.id FROM devops_app_version dav JOIN devops_application da ON da.is_active = TRUE AND da.id = dav.app_id WHERE dav.app_id = #{applicationId}
SELECT id, app_id, version,creation_date FROM devops_app_version WHERE app_id = ( SELECT app_id FROM devops_app_version WHERE id = #{appVersionId} ) AND id > #{appVersionId} ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT COUNT(0) FROM devops_application da JOIN devops_app_version dav ON dav.app_id = da.id WHERE da.project_id = #{projectId} AND dav.id = #{appVersionId}
select * from devops_app_version where app_id = #{appId} order by id desc limit 1
